name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
Week 1: Differents ways to say hello, introducing yourself, asking for some basic information, partner interview
Week 2: Textbook lesson 1 - Hello, my name is...
Week 3: Lesson 1 - Where are you from? What languages do you speak?
Week 4: Lesson 1 - Doing a phone call
Week 5: Lesson 1 - Hotel check-in, filling out forms
Week 6: Lesson 1 - Review, test
Week 7: Lesson 2 - Family and friends
Week 8: Lesson 2 - Introducing family members
Week 9: Lesson 2 - Are you married? Do you have kids?
Week 10: Lesson 2 - Conjugating verbs, listening exercises
Week 11: Lesson 2 - Reading postcards, review, test
Week 12: Lesson 3 - Food and drinks
Week 13: Lesson 3 - Plural forms, working with a dictionary, at the market
Week 14: Lesson 3 - Asking for prices, special offers, measure words
Week 15: Lesson 3 - In a restaurant, my favorite things
Week 16: Lesson 3 - Dictation, review, test
Week 17: Lesson 4 - My apartment
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 10%
Tests after each lesson: 30%
Final exam: 50%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
